programme.title: Brentford vs Arsenal - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 26
programme.desc: Brentford’s first ever Premier League victory came against Arsenal, in their first game in the competition in August 2021. Since then, they’re winless in their last eight against the Gunners. Arsenal lost their first Premier League away game 2-0 against Brentford but have since won their last three by an aggregate score of 7-1.

programme.title: Canceled - Chelsea vs Leeds United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 26 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Chelsea are unbeaten in their last seven Premier League home games against Leeds, winning the last six in a row. Their last defeat was in December 1999, losing 2-0 thanks to a Stephen McPhail brace. Following their 3-1 win at Elland Road in December, Leeds are looking to complete the league double over Chelsea for the first time since their 1991-92 title winning campaign.

programme.title: Rennes vs Paris Saint-Germain - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 22

Rennes have scored at least one goal in each of their last 10 home games against Paris SG in all competitions, netting 13 goals.

programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. Montpellier vs Sant - Raphael - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Football Legends - News
programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. This topic transcends generations, cultures, and nationalities, as fans passionately defend their favorites and recount unforgettable moments on the pitch. From legendary goal scorers to masterful playmakers, the players who have left an indelible mark on the game deserve recognition and celebration. " Football Legends" explore the remarkable careers and contributions of these iconic players who have shaped the beautiful game.

programme.title: UEFA Nations League - League Phase Draw
programme.desc: The 2026/27 UEFA Nations League - League Phase Draw will take place at the Brussels on Thursday, 12 February 2026. The draw will involve 54 participating UEFA member associations, divided into four leagues A, B, C and D. The league phase will start with a prolonged international window from 24 September to 6 October 2026, during which teams will generally play four UEFA Nations League matches in close succession.

programme.title: Football Legends - News
programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. This topic transcends generations, cultures, and nationalities, as fans passionately defend their favorites and recount unforgettable moments on the pitch. From legendary goal scorers to masterful playmakers, the players who have left an indelible mark on the game deserve recognition and celebration. " Football Legends" explore the remarkable careers and contributions of these iconic players who have shaped the beautiful game.
